message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the value this product holds for you at $10,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm aiming to stay within my budget of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider $9,800?  I think that's a fair price considering the value it holds for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $9,700 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of the product.
